name: brightscriptcomment
description: Adds jsdoc @param and @return tags for selected function signatures in Brightscript

brightscriptcomment.addJsStyleComments.description: When enabled, wraps comments in JS-style /** */ comment tags.

brightscriptcomment.addExtraAtStartAndEn.description: When enabled, adds extra comment markers at beginning and end (''''') to delineate the comment.

brightscriptcomment.addFunctionName.description: When enabled, adds the function name and a colon to the comment.

brightscriptcomment.useLowercaseTypeName.description: When enabled, docs will use 'string' or 'object' instead of 'String' or 'Object', etc.

brightscriptcomment.useSimpleTypeNames.description: When enabled, docs use 'Integer' and 'LongInteger' instead of 'Int32' and 'Int64'.

brightscriptcomment.useDynamicIfNoTypeGi.description: When enabled, params will use 'Dynamic' as their types if no type was given.

brightscriptcomment.addReturnOnVoidFunct.description: When enabled, functions that are 'as void' and subs will not have the @return tag.

brightscriptcomment.addReturnWarningOnSu.description: When enabled, warns user when a sub returns a non 'as void' property.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
